Sajib Dasgupta wrote:
> Thanks a ton.
> I thought, every crawler starts from the seed. Anyway, I guess, for 
> Heritrix, they crawl the robots.txt before they crawl the seeds, and 
> hence, they need prerequisite crawling.
> 
> Bottom line:
> Always use 
> 
> "org.archive.crawler.deciderules.PrerequisiteAcceptDecideRule"
> 
> at the end of crawl-order decide rule.

Yep.

Alternatively, you can include a TransclusionDecideRule. In addition to 
ruling-in embedded images/CSS/JS/frames/etc., this will will also 
rule-in prerequisites like robots, DNS lookups, or triggered logins.

- Gordon @ IA
